setActivation(Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>) - Method in class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork
define the activations functions used by the neural network:

all of the layer will use the first activation function except the output layer which will use the second one

define the activations functions used by the neural network:

all of the layer will use the first activation function except the output layer which will use the second one Warning !

setRandom(Random) - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
